lines.text: Big talk coming from a faggot who don't even know what sex his mother is.
Haven't seen you in a while Bobby, where you been?
I've been around, you know me I'm Alway's taking care of business.
Bobby explain something to me, how the fuck can you miss hitting a man in the head At Point Blank Range!

[to Spyro who is on the ground]
Get Your Fucking Ass Up!

[choking Spyro]
you killed my son motherfucker!

[about to kill Marvin bookman]
Fuck this old motherfucker!, better yet Bobby bring your motherfucking ass over here!
Look, it ain't even going on like that!
Man, you wanna be a rebel or not motherfucker COME ON OVER HERE MAN!
your gonna bust his caps up into his ass
Your gonna get your stripes on a rebel or what
